title: Polite burglar makes sure to take his shoes off before entering the Milwaukee home
text:
A burglar may have robbed a couple of thousands of dollars in electronics and their car but he did remember to take his shoes off when he went inside their home.

A couple in Riverwest, Milwaukee, who did not want to be fully named, awoke on Thursday morning to find that their car, laptop and a number of other electronics had been plundered while they slept.

The thief did, however, make sure to lock up the garage door on his way out.

The 'polite' burglar can be seen here trying to work out how to open the garage door before he went in to the house and robbed it from top to bottom. According to the homeowner, who only gave his name as Alex, the man took his shoes off before entering the home

The man can be seen climbing in to the Alex's wife car. He gained access to the property by gaining access to the car which held the garage door opener

Here's the location, before the stairs, that Alex said the burglar took off his shoes before robbing the house

The couple said that the burglar got into the house by first gaining access to their car in the garage.

'A guy was able to break into my car. Which allowed him to get the garage door opener. Which allowed him to get inside the house,' the homeowner, Alex, told Click2Houston.

Once the criminal was inside, he took his shoes off before starting his robbery spree.

He first took what he could from the home office and second-floor bedrooms. Then, he swiped an Ipad that was charging in the bathroom; all with his white trainers in hand.

After he was through plundering the homeowner's possessions, he can be seen with his shoes still off about to take off in Alex's wife's car. The homeowners did say that he remembered to close the door on the way out

'He is literally three feet from the head of my bed where we are sleeping. It's unbelievable. It is extremely scary,' Alex said.

He added that he was glad they didn't wake up because he thought the invader was carrying a pistol from the footage.

The man moved the whole way through the home before leaving in Alex's wife's car.

After getting past the garage door, he even got out of the car to lock it again.

Police said they are searching for the suspect.
description: A couple in Riverwest, Milwaukee awoke on Friday morning to find their home had been plundered. After watching the CCTV, they saw that the burglar 'politely' took off his white trainers before entering.
